summary: Boeing is a huge American company that makes and sells planes, helicopters, rockets, satellites, and missiles all over the world. It also offers leasing and support services. Founded in 1916 in Seattle, it's now one of the biggest aerospace companies and defense contractors globally. Boeing's headquarters are in Virginia, and it has three main divisions: commercial airplanes, defense and space technology, and global services. In 2021, it made $62.3 billion in sales. Recently, the company announced it would cut 17,000 jobs due to global challenges.
title: Boeing
